'''Kreacje świata sensów: szkice o współczesnej powieści angielskiej''' (''Creations of the world of senses: Essays on contemporary British novels'') is a Polish-language book. It contains four articles, which treat William Golding, John Ballard, T.H. White and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], respectively. The article treating Tolkien, "Konwencje gatunkowe i rodzajowe w trylogii J.R.R. Tolkiena" ("Genre and form conventions in J.R.R. Tolkien's trilogy"),<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam|Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref> discusses issues of time and space in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and other topics.<ref>Beata Iwicka: [http://www.fabryka.com/mb/inni/tolkien/iwicka.html Krytycy, potwory i entuzjaści ("Critics, Monsters and Enthusiasts")].</ref>
